Chennai.headline: Marina & Chennai Coastline
Chennai.summary: Chennai is experiencing elevated wave activity with intermittent strong onshore winds. Beach access is restricted in some areas and localized overtopping has been reported.
actions: Avoid shoreline and beaches until official all-clear.
Follow municipal advisories and do not attempt to cross flooded roads.
Secure small craft and move vehicles to higher ground.

Cuddalore.summary: Cuddalore coast has reported a swell surge and water levels are elevated in low-lying zones. Expect fast-changing conditions near estuaries.
actions: Evacuate ground-floor buildings in vulnerable zones.
Stay in touch with local emergency numbers.

Kasimedu.summary: Kasimedu fishing harbour shows signs of coastal erosion and harbor damage; boating operations suspended.
actions: Do not venture into the harbor.
Report damaged vessels to port authorities.

Mumbai.summary: Mumbai is experiencing heavy rainfall and high tides. Waterlogging has been reported in several low-lying areas.
actions: Stay away from coastal areas and beaches.
Follow traffic advisories to avoid waterlogged streets.

Kochi.summary: Kochi is on alert for potential coastal flooding due to heavy rains and storm surge. Rescue teams are on standby.
actions: Be prepared to evacuate if instructed by authorities.

Visakhapatnam.summary: Visakhapatnam is preparing for a cyclonic storm. Strong winds and heavy rainfall are expected.
actions: Secure your home and move to a safe place.
Stay away from the coast and avoid fishing activities.
Follow instructions from the local administration.

Kolkata.summary: Kolkata is likely to be affected by a severe cyclonic storm. Heavy rainfall and strong winds are predicted.
actions: Stay indoors and avoid unnecessary travel.
Keep emergency supplies and first-aid kits ready.
Follow the guidance of disaster management authorities.
